item.title: Talks
item.description: ## 0 TALKS ON YŌGAVĀSIṢṬHA By Prof. A Satyanarayana Shastry Edited by G S Radhakrishnan TALKS ON YŌGAVĀSIṢṬHA ब्रह्मानन्दं परमसुखदं केवलं ज्ञानमूर्तिं द्वन्द्वातीतं गगनसदृशं तत्वमस्यादिलक्षणम् । एकं नित्यं विमलमचलं सर्वधीसाक्षिभूतम् भावातीतं त्रिगुणरहितं सद्गुरुं तं नमामि ॥ I salute to that Sadguru who is the source of eternal bliss, supreme happiness, who has true wisdom, who is beyond the dualities, who is infinite,whose attention is always on the divine, who is unique, eternal, pure, steady, and who sees with the eyes of wisdom who is beyond thoughts and beyond three gunas
